instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2936: What is 820-2936? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.R7020: What is R7020? Current sense shunt resistor for the charger, the resistors between this and the ISL6259 should be proper rating or else machine will turn off the charger. Measuring pins 27/28 on ISL6259 should give you 20.02 ohms. .
definitions.U7000: What is U7000? U7000 refers to the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging IC on Macbooks from 2008-2012.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.CHGR_ACIN: What is CHGR_ACIN? CHGR_ACIN is a signal that is created by a voltage divider between the charger and ground that goes into the ISL6258, ISL6259, ISL9239, or ISL9240 chip that creates PPBUS_G3H. It is necessary for SMC_BC_ACOK & CHGR_ACOK to be present so that the onewire circuit is told to turn on & allow the SMC to speak to the charger..
definitions.CHGR_DCIN: What is CHGR_DCIN? CHGR_DCIN comes directly from charger into ISL6258 or ISL6259, the resistor before it can be blown when there are surges. Should be checked when PPBUS_G3H is missing.
definitions.ISL6259: What is ISL6259? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2010 through 2015.
definitions.SMC_BC_ACOK_VCC: What is SMC_BC_ACOK_VCC? SMC_BC_ACOK_VCC is a voltage that is created if SMC_BC_ACOK & PP3V42_G3H are both present that powers the chipset for the onewire circuit that allows the SMC to talk to the charger on the SYS_ONEWIRE line. This is necessary for the magsafe charger to have a light on it. .

threads.title: [SOLVED]Green light very dark <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A works only battery macbook pro 2011
threads.message: I checked F6905 and <RESISTOR>R7020</RESISTOR> 16,9V it is ok any idea ?

threads.title: [SOLVED]Green light very dark <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A works only battery macbook pro 2011
threads.message:
1) What does <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> measure without the battery?

2) What voltage do you get on <SIGNAL>CHGR_ACIN</SIGNAL> and <SIGNAL>CHGR_DCIN</SIGNAL>?

3) What is the resistance between pins 27/28, and pins 17/18 of <CHIP>U7000</CHIP>?

threads.title: [SOLVED]Green light very dark <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A works only battery macbook pro 2011
threads.message:
Hello
Without Battery :
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> 12,18V
<SIGNAL>CHGR_ACIN</SIGNAL> 3,96V  <SIGNAL>CHGR_DCIN</SIGNAL> 16,38
At pins 27/28 24,2 Ohm , Pins 17/18 6,8 Ohm of <CHIP>U7000</CHIP>

threads.title: [SOLVED]Green light very dark <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A works only battery macbook pro 2011
threads.message: Did you try a known good magsafe board and charger? Voltage on ACOK from <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP>?

threads.title: [SOLVED]Green light very dark <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A works only battery macbook pro 2011
threads.message: Yes i have tested another magsafe board and charger, on ACOK from <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP> 0,54V

threads.title: [SOLVED]Green light very dark <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A works only battery macbook pro 2011
[SOLVED]Green light very dark <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A works only battery macbook pro 2011
threads.message: Measure resistance to GND on ACOK line. If that is not really low it is probably a dead 6259.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Green light very dark <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A works only battery macbook pro 2011
threads.message: resistance is high on line ACOK, i wait a new isl chip for replacement

threads.title: [SOLVED]Green light very dark <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A works only battery macbook pro 2011
threads.message: I replace <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP> <CHIP>U7000</CHIP> it works thank you very much for your help solved
